hero.subheadline: Stickball is a community-centered, AI-enabled learning platform that helps schools, employers, and communities build lasting skills targeted to the needs of every learner. Fast to deploy, customizable for any audience, and proven to deliver measurable impact.

featureTiles.title: Why Choose Stickball?
featureTiles.subtitle: Our platform is designed with flexibility and accessibility in mind, ensuring every learner gets the support they need to succeed.
featureTiles.ctaText: Ready to see these features in action?

customizable.title: Customizable for Every Learner
customizable.description: Tailored at the community, classroom, or individual level

fastDeploy.title: Fast to Deploy
fastDeploy.description: Launch in a matter of days, with no IT overhead

anyLanguage.title: Available in Any Language
anyLanguage.description: Designed to reflect the language and culture of every learner

accessible.title: Accessible by Design
accessible.description: Built for learners with diverse needs and abilities

mobileFriendly.title: Mobile-Friendly
mobileFriendly.description: Runs on any device, no app required

methodology.title: Our Methodology:
methodology.description: At Stickball, we design learning experiences that actually stick. Our research-backed approach is grounded in the widely recognized Learning Pyramid, which demonstrates that different learning methods lead to very different levels of retention.
methodology.passiveMethods: Passive methods alone result in retention as low as
methodology.activeMethods: Active methods can boost retention up to
methodology.conclusion: That's why Stickball's methodology is built to move learners down the pyramid. From understanding concepts to applying them in real life.
methodology.ctaTitle: Ready to Experience the Learning Pyramid in Action?
methodology.ctaDescription: See how our methodology transforms passive learning into active, engaging experiences that stick.

learn.description: Introduces key concepts through highly engaging content. This foundational layer supports comprehension across a wide range of learning styles.
features: Easy-to-digest text, targeted by reading level
Built-in accessibility with translation for any language

practice.description: Build skills and confidence through interactive, adaptive activities that require active decision-making.

apply.description: Reinforces knowledge through realistic, high-stakes simulations, leading to real confidence and outcomes.
features: AI-powered live interactions and decision-making simulations
Projects that require learners to explain or act on what they've learned

whoWeServe.title: Built to Serve
whoWeServe.subtitle: From classrooms to boardrooms, from city halls to community centers - Stickball adapts to serve every learning environment and audience.

alfred.quote: The engaging content and real-life scenarios help students understand finance and build confidence.
alfred.author: Alfred Daviso, Ph.D
alfred.title: Akron University

jenn.quote: Our students thrive when we connect learning with real-world experiences... Thanks to Bellwether Community Credit Union and Stickball, we're giving students a fun, hands-on way to build confidence, collaboration, and essential life skills.
jenn.author: Dr. Jenn Chmiel
jenn.title: Superintendent of Manchester School District

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Empowering communities through innovative education technology that actually sticks.
about.missionDescription: Stickball is a leading education technology platform dedicated to promoting financial literacy and workforce readiness, with a growing footprint across 10 states. With interactive lessons and personalized guidance, Stickball empowers students and professionals to make informed financial decisions through community-centered solutions.

educationTechnology.title: Education Technology
educationTechnology.description: Leading platform for financial literacy and workforce readiness

personalizedLearning.title: Personalized Learning
personalizedLearning.description: Adaptive paths tailored to individual needs

inclusiveDesign.title: Inclusive Design
inclusiveDesign.description: Serves individuals of all abilities and backgrounds

fastImplementation.title: Fast Implementation
fastImplementation.description: Quick deployment with lasting community impact

communityDriven.title: Community-Driven Development
communityDriven.description: The platform blends interactive simulations with personalized learning paths to build essential life and workplace skills, with everything developed collaboratively with community members and continuously adapted based on their feedback.

inclusiveDesign.title: Inclusive Design
inclusiveDesign.description: Stickball's inclusive design serves individuals of all abilities and backgrounds, with multi-language accessibility ensuring the program serves diverse populations.

bottomUpStrategy.title: Bottom-Up Strategy
bottomUpStrategy.description: The company's bottom-up approach ensures that educational tools remain in communities for life, creating lasting impact through sustained local partnerships.

lastingImpact.title: Lasting Impact
lastingImpact.description: By focusing on community needs and building sustainable partnerships, we create educational solutions that grow and evolve with the communities they serve.
